# WCUPA Enrollment

Data, analysis, and visuals of West Chester University of Pennsylvania's enrollment data from 2003 to 2019.

# Challenges

+ Downloading data from URLS
+ Data are in different formats
    - xlsx or xls or pdf
    - different information between file types
+ University changes college structure in 2017
    - Several colleges renames
    - College of Arts and Sciences broken into College of Arts and Humanities and College of Science and Mathematics
